genresAdvancedInfo.name: lai hla
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Lai Hla is a traditional music genre from Myanmar, also known as Burmese folk music. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the saung (harp), pat waing (drum circle), and hne (reed instrument). The lyrics often tell stories of love, nature, and the everyday lives of Myanmar people. Lai Hla is an important part of Myanmar's cultural heritage and is often performed at festivals and other cultural events.
